Text: To poster. The main reason for a site like The Priate Bay is first and foremost to enlighten people of free speech and the right to freely distribute information. At the same time it is a rebellious uproar against big multinational companies vs. the individual. By posting this rip you are undermining the struggle that the maker and people harmed by companies like Dole. So please remove it and let people buy the product (DVD) so the proprietors may fight the capitalist assholes that are trying, with money and power, to put a gag on freedom and the hard working, poor, labour workers.
@Jazzoo41260 "please remove it and let people buy the product (DVD) so the proprietors may fight the capitalist assholes" - I do hope ur taking the piss
